This set comes with the book with a Liza minidoll and bricks
column3: exclusive touring car. A nice book for old and new fans alike.

column1: Bricks are in a clear packet inside a big box (as shown in this set image). Parts list is printed outside the box. Instruction is inside the book.
Good selection of parts. Included is part 2341 in white that I only have seen in this set. The car'
column3: Cockpit W. Bow 3X6X1) is consistent with other friends car. Some 2015 parts like the lavender curved slopes 6037655 and&nbsp
column4: 6097647. The rest of the parts are quite common.&nbsp

column5: s Friends Advent Calendar (41102). She has a long thick blonde wavy hair tied half-way&nbsp

column12: Her outfit is quite common as the torso (6049743)&nbsp

column3: My kid can follow easily as the front and back are almost similar. She asked for the steering wheel, though. :p Who knows this car maybe the car of the future fully automated. \/(^-^)\/

column2: s a tiny car good for 2 minidolls. It has a nice purple tone.

column1: The book has a hard cover with slipcase. It
column2: has lots of great ideas to make up your own story/adventure. It introduces the Friends characters to get you familiar.&nbsp
column3: Similar to Ideas book it shows you details of&nbsp
column4: useful pieces/bricks and how to build them.&nbsp

column1: The build is simple with use of common pieces so that your kid (and you ^,^) will have idea on how to make great builds out of various parts.
